roleset.name: make rare
roleset.note: RAREFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rarefy' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry other_cos-45.4. (from rarefy.01-v)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: For years, this group included a stable of classics -- Bordeaux first growths (Lafite-Rothschild, Latour, Haut-Brion, Petrus), Grand Cru Burgundies (Romanee-Conti and La Tache) deluxe Champagnes (Dom Perignon or Roederer Cristal), rarefied sweet wines (Chateau Yquem or Trockenbeerenauslesen Rieslings from Germany, and Biondi-Santi Brunello Riserva from Tuscany).

roleset.name: uncommon, infrequent
roleset.note: RARE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from rare.01-j)

example.name: Single arg
example.text: Most cars with that mileage will be rare and possibly worth something.

roleset.name: cooked a short time, still red
roleset.note: RARE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from rare.02-j)

example.name: With CXN, who's hungry?
example.text: The burger was so rare that the bits that fell out when I picked the burger up, they could be pressed and molded.
example.arg: [so] [that the bits that fell out when I picked the burger up, they could be pressed and molded]
